name: X-Men..Marvel Comics Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Wolverine.

	When Wolverine is on solo missions in the Far East, most of his friends know him by 'Patch'.

questions.text: What are Wolverine's bones laced with?
questions.explanation:
Adamantium.

	Wolverine had his bones laced with Adamantium during the Project X days.

Cyclops.

	Scott's codename comes form his appearance. He wears a Ruby Red Quartz visor which hold sback his mutant gift of firing a beam from his eyes.

questions.text: Who turned Storm back into a young child ?
questions.explanation:
Nanny.

	The Nanny kidnapped Storm and changed her into a child.

questions.text: Who is Tom Cassidy's best friend ?
What was Sean Cassidy's job before he joined the X-men ?
questions.explanation:
Interpol Agent.

	As well as being an Interpol agent, after leaving the X-men, he became the headmaster and co-leader of Generation X.

questions.text: Who is Cable in relation to Cyclops ?
questions.explanation:
Son.

	Cable, a.k.a. Nathan Summers, is the son of Scott Summers. He was taken as a baby into the future and then returned to the present as a full grown man.

Nathaniel Essex.

	Nathan Essex was a scientist in the latter half of the 19th Century. He was made immortal by the powers of Apocalypse.

questions.text: Apart from the United States, where else have the X-men been based ?
questions.explanation:
Australia.

	When the X-men were reborn, they found themselves in the Australian Outback.

questions.correct: Iceman, Beast, Jean Grey, Cyclops, Angel
